Dated this the 8 day of December, 2017
ORDER
In case of surrender the petitioner before the court below
within 15 days from today, the court below shall consider and
dispose of the application seeking bail that may be filed by the
petitioner with advance notice to the learned Public Prosecutor
in charge of the case, preferably on the same day itself.
This Crl.M.C.is allowed as above.
Sd/-
B.KEMAL PASHA
